author: @sentdex
text: in their respective plots, did you label=label1 and label=label2. If so, also check your definitions of label1 and label2, make sure they are indeed corresponding to av1 and av2.

author: @sentdex
text: Hey, that's actually more likely to be because it fails something, then gets to a sleeping function where you've not defined time.   Look @ the top of your script's imports and make sure you have "import time" there. If you insert an invalid color, but we made a try and except loop there, so then it'd continue on to the sleep and then break there.
